successes.title: Bartendro - A Cocktail Dispensing Robot
successes.description: Bartendro is a modular and open-source cocktail dispensing robot!

Pledges.description: THANKS: A huge thank you and the knowledge that your helping make our project a reality. A shout out on Twitter, and a sweet die-cut sticker of our logo to remember us with, and your name will be listed on our website as an original contributor.
SHOTGLASS: A shot glass with the friendly Party Robotics logo, and everything from the $5 reward level.

T-SHIRT: A Party Robotics T-shirt in your size and everything from the $5 reward level! Want the shirts to say something interesting or funny? How about "I can't wait for our cocktail robot overlords!" Vote in the the comments on what the t-shirts should say!
SUPER FAN: You get the rewards at all the previous levels: t-shirt, shot glass and sticker, AND you get to name a drink that appears in the menu of our first shipment of bots.

DISPENSER: For EARLY BACKERS! An open-source dispenser for the tinkerers! Save $30 by being one of the first to back at this level. The dispenser is a peristaltic pump with encoder machined to accept our open source electronics. Comes with 5 feet of beverage tubing. You'll have to provide your own power supply, serial communication device, and a way to mount the pump.

DISPENSER: An open-source dispenser for the tinkerers!  The dispenser is a peristaltic pump with encoder machined to accept our open source electronics. Comes with 5 feet of beverage tubing. You'll have to provide your own power supply, serial communication device, and a way to mount the pump.
DISPENSER & MINI ROUTER: This combo of parts lets you make your own internet connected pump. You'll have to supply your own Raspberry Pi and a way to mount the pump.

SHOTBOT: For EARLY BACKERS! Get one of the first ShotBots with a two digit serial number! The easiest way to serve a shot with your smartphone. Fill it with liquor, wheat-grass or whatever your heart desires. Comes with one dispenser, a frame, power supply and Raspberry Pi! Some light assembly may be required.

SHOTBOT: The easiest way to serve a shot with your smartphone. Fill it with liquor, wheat-grass or whatever your heart desires. Comes with one dispenser, a frame, power supply and Raspberry Pi! Some light assembly may be required.
BARTENDRO STARTER KIT: 3 Dispensers, 1 miniRouter board. You'll have to provide your own Raspberry Pi, power supply and frame.

BARTENDRO 3: For EARLY BACKERS! First 50 only! You'd be surprised how many drinks 3 ingredients can make. This is a full bot, just provide your own tablet or smartphone. Comes with 3 Dispensers, tubing, miniRouter board & Raspberry Pi, USB WiFi, power supply and frame.

BARTENDRO 3: Second batch of 50! You'd be surprised how many drinks 3 ingredients can make. This is a full bot, just provide your own tablet or smartphone. Comes with 3 Dispensers, tubing, miniRouter board & Raspberry Pi, USB WiFi, power supply and frame.

BARTENDRO 3: You'd be surprised how many drinks 3 ingredients can make. This is a full bot, just provide your own tablet or smartphone. Comes with 3 Dispensers, tubing, miniRouter board & Raspberry Pi, USB WiFi, power supply and frame.

BARTENDRO 7 STARTER KIT: This reward is here by popular demand. Build your own bot with 7 dispensers, 1 full size router board, a power supply, a Raspberry Pi with SD card and WiFi dongle and tubing.  All the guts of the bot minus the enclosure and frame. Please send us pics of your creations!

BARTENDRO 7: For EARLY BACKERS! First 25 only! A really nice size to have. This is a full bot, just provide your own tablet or smartphone. Comes with 7 Dispensers with liquid level sensing, tubing, a router board, Raspberry Pi, USB WiFi, power supply, enclosure and frame. Some light assembly may be required.

BARTENDRO 7: A really nice size to have. This is a full bot, just provide your own tablet or smartphone. Comes with 7 Dispensers with liquid level sensing, tubing, a router board, Raspberry Pi, USB WiFi, power supply, enclosure and frame. Some light assembly may be required.

BARTENDRO 7: A really nice size to have. This is a full bot, just provide your own tablet or smartphone. Comes with 7 Dispensers with liquid level sensing, tubing, a router board, Raspberry Pi, USB WiFi, power supply, enclosure and frame. Some light assembly may be required.

BARTENDRO 15 STARTER KIT: This reward is here by popular demand. Build your own bot with 15 dispensers, 1 full size router board, a power supply, a Raspberry Pi with SD card and WiFi dongle and tubing. All the guts of the bot minus the enclosure and frame. Please send us pics of your creations!

BARTENDRO 15: For EARLY BACKERS! First 10 only at this level! This bot can make by far the most number of drinks. This is a full bot, just provide your own tablet or smartphone. Comes with 15 Dispensers with liquid level sensing, tubing, a router board, Raspberry Pi, USB WiFi, power supply, enclosure and frame. Comes mostly assembled. Some light assembly may be required.

BARTENDRO 15: For not as Early Backers! Second 10 only at this level! This bot can make by far the most number of drinks. This is a full bot, just provide your own tablet or smartphone. Comes with 15 Dispensers with liquid level sensing, tubing, a router board, Raspberry Pi, USB WiFi, power supply, enclosure and frame. Comes mostly assembled. Some light assembly may be required.

BARTENDRO 15: This bot can make by far the most number of drinks. This is a full bot, just provide your own tablet or smartphone. Comes with 15 Dispensers with liquid level sensing, tubing, a router board, Raspberry Pi, USB WiFi, power supply, enclosure and frame. Some light assembly may be required.
DECKED OUT BARTENDRO 15: Comes with a tablet and mount. Comes fully assembled and ready to use. Plus up to 10 hours of personalized Skype support.

CUSTOM BRANDED BARTENDRO 15:  Same as above, with your choice of colors for the enclosure and internal cabling. Add panels to the outer faces of the bot with a cutout or silkscreen of your brand or logo. Plus up to 10 hours of personalized Skype support.
